data.message: Listen I might only be 11 but I'm tired of this discrimination it's not right that the human race isn't equal, people have the right to love who they want. It shouldn't matter what others say, you should remain voiceless because you really shouldn't be one to judge others, gays should have their rights even if you are hating on them what happens to be so wrong that you must nag them over and over just imagine if you have loved somebody and you were forced to only be "friends" with them your life wouldn't go too smoothly.

replies.message: It will never be equal.  That is NOT what gays want, it is not what blacks want, it is not what terrorists want and our president isn't teaching equality either.  In fact, he is only created a civil war.  He has divided this country.  You young kids need to realize who is ruining our nation.  Make your own decisions and consider your ancestors.

Hmmm while I do agree to respecting ones ancestors...I am black...and I am confused by your statement. I would very much appreciate equality. So I would very much like you to speak for me and tell me what it is I want....please?...
Cooper, you are amazing! An 11 year old puts all the haters to shame, I love it.
Except we are not hating, merely expressing our opinion, there is a big difference.
Jill must be a right wing tea bagger....if so, her comment makes perfect sense to me.
Well said Cooper! It's good to know that the youth is being so open-minded about these issues, and recognising that they shouldn't even be issues. You've just restored a little faith in the future.
Bet your moma is looking for daddy, and daddy is looking for a moma .
i dont hate gays no disrespect kid but its not right by any means
why do you have a facebook if your 11 and why would you even tell us your age. big no-no there kid
